---
title: "Joins"
---


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
f <- read.csv("../data/farms2.csv")
f
```

```{r}
p <- read.csv("../data/prices.csv")
p
```

## Mutate Join
```{r}
f |> left_join(p, join_by(prod == pr))
```

```{r}
f |> inner_join(p, join_by(prod == pr))
```

```{r}
f |> full_join(p, join_by(prod == pr))
```

## Filter Join

```{r}
f |> semi_join(p, join_by(prod == pr))
```

```{r}
f |> anti_join(p, join_by(prod == pr))
```
